p: The antioxidant capacity of R. officinalis essential oil demonstrated in our study by the ORAC method was also found by a DPPH free radical scavenging test [ 65, 89, 90]. According to Papageorgiou et al. [ 77], the antioxidant activity of rosemary oil could be due to the synergistic action of minor compounds, instead of the oxygenated sesquiterpenesâ€™ contents. Other authors have identified some oxygenated monoterpenes as responsible for the antioxidant activity of R. officinalis [ 91].
